text: We Baby Bears is an American animated television series created by Manny Hernandez for Cartoon Network. It is a spin-off prequel of the animated series We Bare Bears, which was created by Daniel Chong. It premiered on January 1, 2022. On January 31, 2022, the series was renewed for a second season. ==Premise== We Baby Bears follows Grizz, Panda, and Ice Bear as babies searching for a new home in a magical teleporting box. ==Voice cast== * Connor Andrade & Luxton Handspiker (for the shorts) as Baby Grizz * Amari McCoy & Mia SwamiNathan (in season 3 for the new voice & shorts) as Baby Panda * Max Mitchell & Rain Janjua (for the shorts) as Baby Ice Bear * Demetri Martin as the Narrator of Ice Bear's dad Celebrity guest stars include: Anjali Bhimani, Rhys Darby, Janeane Garofalo, Young M.A., Jason Mantzoukas, Stephen Oyoung, Willow Smith, and Bernardo Velasco. ==Episodes== == References == === Works cited === * "Ep." is shortened form for episode and refers to an episode number of the We Baby Bears television series. === Other references === == Other websites == * * Category:We Bare Bears Category:2022 American television series debuts Category:2020s American animated television series Category:American children's television series
title: We Baby Bears
